H0.text: Light is the type of energy carried through a metal cable.

H1.text: Chemical energy is carried through a metal cable.

H2.text: Electrical energy is the type of energy carried through a metal cable.

H3.text: Nuclear is the type of energy carried through a metal cable.

A4.text: Electrical energy is the energy transferred as electric charges move between points with different electric potential, that is, as they move across a potential difference.
